Title: Grants a $100,000 real property tax exemption to conservation clubs and rod and gun clubs owning certain land having an assessed value of $500,000 or less
Summary: Grants a $100,000 real property tax exemption to conservation clubs and rod and gun clubs owning land acquired prior to January 1, 2025, having an assessed value of $500,000 or less.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to granting a tax exemption to certain land owned by a conservation club or a rod and gun club
